title: Utopia by Saint Sir Thomas More [republicV]
description:
Sir Thomas More, was an English lawyer, author, and statesman. During his lifetime he earned a reputation as a leading humanist scholar. More coined the word "utopia", a name he gave to an ideal, imaginary island nation whose political system he described in a book published in 1516.
This book is all about the fictional country called Utopia. This country uses gold for chamber pots and prison chains, pearls and diamonds for childrenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s playthings, and requires that a man and a woman see each other exactly as they are, naked, before getting married.
